thread.title: New York Mayor Bill de Blasio Made More Than Gov. Andrew Cuomo in 2017

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York Mayor Bill de Blasio Made More Than Gov. Andrew Cuomo in 2017
text:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomoâ€™s 2017 income fell after set payments from his memoir ended, netting him less for the year than New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, according to tax returns the two made public Tuesday.
The two-term Democratic governor released his 2017 tax forms Tuesday showing that he took home $212,776 last year through his $179,000 state salary and a blind investment trust.
